description:
The American Express Serve® App makes it easy to: 
•	Add money to your Account from your bank account, credit or debit card¹
•	Access your Direct Deposit information
•	Add offers to your Account and start saving on dining, shopping and more
•	Check your Available Balance
•	View your transaction history 
•	Pay bills
•	Set money aside with Reserve 
•	Add checks with your mobile phone
•	Send money to your Subaccounts and see their transaction history 
•	Access the largest free cash reload network with 27,500 locations²

What is American Express Serve? 
We’re a full service, reloadable prepaid account from American Express with no credit check, no minimum balance, and no hidden fees. You can use your American Express Serve Card in stores, online, and at ATMs worldwide. With an Account, you can direct deposit your paycheck, government benefits and tax refund, pay bills and have access to 24/7 customer service.
Visit us at Serve.com for more information, including our Fee Chart. 

¹ Cash advance fees may apply for credit card loads. Please check with your credit card issuer for details.
² Learn more at serve.com/addcash
releaseNotes:
We’ve made even more updates to get excited about:
·  Amex Offers are now available – Save on dining, shopping and more
·  We made the app faster and more reliable by fixing bugs
